website_summaries.verdict: Two scents to sample for your own needs.
pros: Dr. Teal's is a well-known brand, and this two-pack features two of their most popular scents: eucalyptus and lavender
Quick-dissolving formula for more comfortable baths
Sturdy closure keeps moisture from getting in the bag, increasing the shelf life

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE THIS PRODUCT. Contains toxic "parfum" among other unnecessary ingredients. Expect the same effect as soaking in a bath of rat poison. Includes effects of nausea, irritability, and fatigue. Do yourself and your health a favor, and get a bag of real magnesium chloride, which more absorbable and relaxing than magnesium sterate. Add a few drops of your favorite essential oil and enjoy a toxin free relaxing bath. Which is what commercial "Dr Teal" attempted to achieve here, but instead proved once again the best "Dr" is yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Very relaxing and absolutely works
customer_reviews.text: Aside from the price, these salts are awesome! Don't know what else to say. I'm a dude that works out a lot and gets weird muscle tears. These salts absolutely help. Words of caution though, you might be induced to fall asleep in the tub listening to Enya. Don't go out that way.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like them and they help his muscles
customer_reviews.text: I buy these salts for my boyfriend. He seems to like them and they help his muscles. Although, I will by these from the grocery store from now on, or buy one as an add on. $18.99(what I paid) is a bit overpriced. It is about $5 or $6 at the store at Wegmans. Safeway too I think. Depending on the type of bath salt. Some are even $4.50. I wanted to gave it shipped by a certain day, so it worked for me. I will just stock up from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Domi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These salts are excellent especially mixed together. I mix the lavender and eucalyptus together and light a vanilla candle and the mix is divine. This salt is very fine and dissolves quickly in the bath. Perfect for relaxation and to ease muscle pains. This is my go to brand and this company ships quickly and stands behind their orders. Overall highly recommend and would certainly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Arrica Wynn

customer_reviews.title: My feet love these salts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a foot soak when working at a cattle guest ranch all summer. My tired feet thanked me every time I soaked. Salts dissolved well in warm or cool weather, both fragrances smelled great. The fragrances were very strong so I would tone it down with unscented salts if I used as a bath soak. I'll definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa JF

customer_reviews.title: good but pricey for amount given
customer_reviews.text: I like these and the included scents are refreshing, but really it's just regular epsom salts with some scents added in. All epsom salts are just magnesium sulfate. For the price, you're probably better off just buying the cheapest bulk bag and adding your own essential oils or scents.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: great product, horrible package
customer_reviews.text: The fancy "press lock" seal of the package was totally filled with salt crystals the first time I opened it, preventing the bag from reclosing. So I store it in a separate sealing bag, and that does the trick. The salt itself is great. The scent dissipates after about 20 minutes in the bath. I like having both scents depending on the mood I am in. The eucalyptus one is great for a head cold.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Brick

customer_reviews.title: Great for foot soaks!
customer_reviews.text: What can you say...it's salt, lol. We were doing a "Women's Day" event for our clients, and foot soaks were part of the festivities. We needed epsom salt in bulk, and this filled the bill. With Amazon Prime, the bags arrived in two days, in plenty of time for our event, and the cost was very reasonable. Definitely plan to buy these again for future events.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Downs

customer_reviews.title: Soothes Sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: From over use or strained muscles to tension and axiety as well as fibromyalgia, I absolutely swear by soaking in a hot bath with these Epsom salts. Epsom salt does wonders for my aliments, and these have beautiful, soothing, and calming scents that ease the mind alongside the body. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: ahhhhhmazing!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! As a runner, Epsom salts are just a part of life. This brand, however, has been the best brand I've used thus far. It dissolves really well and the scented ones I've tried are very relaxing. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: T. B. St Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This makes your bathroom smell like a spa after using it ,so clean and makes your sinuses clear and loosens your muscles ,after work I look forward to just soaking very relaxing.It would be perfect for an athlete
customer_reviews.author: Bmw

customer_reviews.title: Effective and now a steady part of my bath ritual
customer_reviews.text: Loved the scents, loved the salts. Relaxing; helps muscle soreness and relaxation in general. When I get out of the bathtub I feel as relaxed as someone who just had a couple glasses of wine. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is way too strong.
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well but they added perfume in addition to the essential oils. So buyer beware, if you're prone to headaches or sensitive to strong smells. We had to open windows to get rid of the overpowering smell.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Does 2-4 soaks max
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to soak in the tub but dirrections say to add alot to your bath and it runs out fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T momma of 3

customer_reviews.title: but these are great. I feel like they make my skin even ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of classic Epsom salts, so I was a little afraid to switch and get some scented ones, but these are great. I feel like they make my skin even more soft than the non scented type. Love them and they both smell great!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Dr Teals is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Love these scents. Wish you could get them in larger sizes. Take multiple epsom salt bath per week for sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will thank you
customer_reviews.text: The lavender smells great. I have not opened the other bag, I will repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aura Perez

customer_reviews.title: CONTAINS FRAGRANCE
customer_reviews.text: These are falsely advertised as having essential oil scents. Once I received the actual products in the packaging, it says that there is fragrance in the contents. I got a headache from the first bath I took because I hadn't read the contents on the bag, believing the online marketing that it was natural essential oils only
customer_reviews.author: Veronica McCracken

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! The scents are wonderful and make my bath smell wonderful. Thank you Dr. Teals for coming up with nicely scented Epson salt. I often have stiff muscles and a nice soak in the bath with these salts is the perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Lou

customer_reviews.title: In love with this
customer_reviews.text: Very much in love with this product. It is truly relaxing along with helping sore muscles. Also find it helps with colds.
customer_reviews.author: Kick Mom

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack of Dr Teals Epsom salt with the lavender and eucalyptus/ spearmint. So far I’ve used the lavender which is nice. I don’t totally see a difference in an unscented one compared to this one but either way it’s nice and relaxing all the same.
customer_reviews.author: JBMTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend to take baths after his weekly workout routine. It's helped so much with his muscle pain & also the house smells great when he uses these.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance Not Lasting As Long
customer_reviews.text: Dr. Teal's has been my favorite brand of bath salts for years, but now recently I'm noticing the fragrance in the bath water only lasts for about five minutes, and then it's gone completely. What happened? It's the same for both fragrances.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to self care routine
customer_reviews.text: Heavenly smell, also makes you feel like you are really doing so self care/self love. Even my hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CZG2011

customer_reviews.title: Keep you feet feeling rested and cared for
customer_reviews.text: Epsom salts are a natural choice for tired feet. Make hot water seem blissful, add a small scoop of lavender mixed with eucalyptus and you've delivered a treat for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Norsekamer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: These two scents are my favorites from Dr. Teal, so finding them sold as a duo was great. I use these regularly either to relax in a bath before bed or after a hard workout. You can't go wrong with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like a hot bath with Dr. Teal's for my achy joints!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Great scents! They really do help. I like this brand because of the ingredients they use. They also carry a lot of different types. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Time out can be a very good thing. Dr. Teal's way
customer_reviews.text: Ah...ah..ah..tbe sound of calmness. The aches and tiredness floats away. Give it about 10 quiet minutes .....alone in the tub. Door closed, no noise, no phone, no chatter. Take care of that body and mind.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice to receive the right product... The label is correct but the product inside the plastic wrap doesn't match. Now I'm stuck with two bags of "milk" epsom salt....
customer_reviews.author: Traci S.

customer_reviews.title: Feels good!
customer_reviews.text: Like this product. It relaxes me and helps with back pain. Very soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are use it on my plants  !!
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle this Epson salt’s in my outdoor garden ,On my hosta and green bushy plants and it makes them fuller and healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Petrou

customer_reviews.title: Velcro seal does not stay sealed
customer_reviews.text: The velcro seal did not hold in the epsom salts and prior to opening it was obvious it had leaked past the point it should have. Because of that ,upon opening, a bunch went everywhere. It also would not reseal once opened. Love the product but very disappointed in this packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle H Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I think this stuff is great to have. The smell is fairly strong but not bad, and it is very soothing when added to a bath. Will likely order this more often
customer_reviews.author: Lori Bartholome

customer_reviews.title: Great muscle relaxer before bed!
customer_reviews.text: My husband always has muscle aches and these salt works wonders! Filled up a warm/hot bath tub and poured about 2 +1/2 cups of the epsom salt in. He soaked in there for about 15 minutes before bed and he said his muscles were relaxed and tender; he had a better night sleep! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: R & R for your tootsies
customer_reviews.text: Mixed these strongly scented Epsom salts into my plain ones to double the volume. Lovely aroma while soaking my sore feet. Definitely helps relax and restore at the end of a long day. My only complaint is that the bags leaked a little during transport inside the shipping envelope and I had to transfer product into a sealed container.
customer_reviews.author: Chriselle V

customer_reviews.title: It's Dr. Teal, but the bags were definitely ...
customer_reviews.text: It's Dr. Teal, but the bags were definitely smaller than what you'd paid for. I suggest going to brick and mortar stores for getting the bigger bags of these Dr. Teals so you're not running out fast.
customer_reviews.author: SNC

customer_reviews.title: Soak a rub dub.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bathtub girl and love to soak in a warm tub wthe Dr. Teals Epson salts. It relaxes your entire body and soothes aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Diane Standish

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: Always great to have a nice epsom salt bath as needed! I have used this product for years, normally buying in the store. Found pricing better on Amazon so bought from here this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the amount. Both smell amazing as well ❤
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Good product good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice to soak your feet in. Smells good and leaves no residue.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bingham

customer_reviews.title: TEALS I LOVE THIS PRODUCT FOR MY FAMILY GOOD FOR SORE BODIES ...
customer_reviews.text: WILL ALWAY USE MR.TEALS I LOVE THIS PRODUCT FOR MY FAMILY GOOD FOR SORE BODIES AND THE OTHER ONE DOES RELAX YOU FOR THAT LETS LEAVE THE WORL BEHIND FEELING.
customer_reviews.author: THE FAMILY

customer_reviews.title: The only epsom salt for me
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff especially when you want to soothe sore muscles or just relax. Smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product but one of the bags arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: I love Dr. Teal products, but one of the bags arrived broken and a lot of the salt was just sitting in the box. Such a waste.
customer_reviews.author: bianca

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff and can't get enough
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and can't get enough. Much has been said for Epson Salt baths...But when you add the smell of Eucalyptus Spearmint or Lavender...Oh my LORD! It's So wonderful!!! The contents were received in a timely manner with no issues. I would order from this re-seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: Love soakin’
customer_reviews.text: Came super fast just in time for me to soak. Love both of em will order again
customer_reviews.author: Lindz

customer_reviews.title: So relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I love this pack it was very affordable, I want them to carry the pink Himalayan though
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: My must haves
customer_reviews.text: I love these and re purchase them all the time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. A great buy for my wife, she loves soaking her feet with this Epson's salt.
customer_reviews.author: coachman08

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Expensive Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Forever the expensive stuff. This smells great and does the job for a fraction of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: procsol

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!! Scent is synthetic and overpowering!!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never buy this product again as long as they continue to make it with synthetic fragrances! Smell is so strong you cannot enjoy and peaceful bath. This went straight into the garbage!!! Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Eucalyptus smells like floor cleaner, afraid to open the crappy packaging with the “velcro” technology of the lavender one to sniff that one oht. Overpriced, must have been in a panic when I bought one of these bags for $10
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Shops

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and seem to do the job
customer_reviews.text: These smell amazing to me. I use them regularly and they seem to relieve a lot of the aches and pains I am experiencing with pregnancy. I look forward to using them every time and I will want to order more once they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemerry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent, relaxing soaks
customer_reviews.text: So relaxing and wonderful scent. I sometimes leave the water a little longer because it makes the room smell so great!
customer_reviews.author: tlbSoMD

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these !! Always use it for bath time even for my toddler definitely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Estefani

customer_reviews.title: Great product but cheaper at Walmart
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it was cheaper at Walmart after adding the shipping charge.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vincent Eccles

customer_reviews.title: Correction
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived in a box that was clearly too small to fit both bags of epsom salt. It had busted open and only contained the bag of lavender. The eucalyptus one was missing. There wasn’t room for it it begin with! Update: Two packed wrapped together.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing epsom salt baths!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lavender scent, very relaxing and great for soaking!
customer_reviews.author: bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money! You'll only get 1 bag when you pay for 2
customer_reviews.text: Scent is great but only received one bag very disappointed in my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Eucalyptus Salt is my new favorite bath product
customer_reviews.text: The Eucalyptus Salt is my new favorite bath product. It smells AMAZING. I have very sensitive skin and both varieties of salts leave me feeling refreshed after a bath, without any dry skin. My muscles feel great too!
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Chicago

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I started feeling drowsy the minute I went into the bath with the salt. After 5-10 minutes my left side of my body started burning. When I got out, I had red rashes all over my body and with a burning sensation. Never again buying this!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Duque

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: As promised, two 3 lb bags of Epsom salts that are great for soaking. The price is right and I like the different scents.
customer_reviews.author: Anati

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice, but really expensive
customer_reviews.text: The scents on these are fantastic, but the price is not. Way too high for the quantity you get. Just get plain un scented Epsom salts and add a couple of drops of essential oil to the bath. Will save you a great deal over the long term, and also gives better flexibility with your scent levels. These are almost overpowering with the level of scent to them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: No aches or pain.
customer_reviews.text: Use this all most daily because I workout and my son surfs. Always feel pain and fatigue relief after a good soak. A must in our household.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: After a long day of work I love to use this I feel really good when I am so tired

customer_reviews.title: The smell is nice for a change. Nothing more to add.
customer_reviews.text: Smells divine, useful in a bath for 1. Sore muscles 2. Detox

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved the aroma of these - wish I could find them in the store in larger sizes!

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful, nice large bags and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful, nice large bags and great for the price! Only bad thing.. one bag had a small hole in it so some of the salts poured out in the box. I still give 5 stars for the product!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi D

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Eucalyptus for me and lavender for my fiancee. Very good deal.

customer_reviews.title: Love the scents!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered a leg injury last year and have been taking Epsom salt baths with Dr. Teal's ever since. I love this stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The scents are great on each of these. It's strong and it does the job well. I highly recommend either of these
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M

customer_reviews.title: Great salts but not a great value
customer_reviews.text: Great salts but not a great value. Paid twice as much here as they sell for in any store. Bought them as part of a gift that I had a spending limit on and now I feel like a cheapskate.
customer_reviews.author: blynn

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much! It is the best way to end a day
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Triggered my asthma!
customer_reviews.text: These products are highly perfumed, and most likely synthetic perfumes, as they triggered my asthma (which does not happen with essential oils). The eucalyptus and spearmint don't smell like eucalyptus or spearmint. My fault for not reading the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot with itchy skin & body aches. And the smell is great.
customer_reviews.author: TLCmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have on hand
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have on hand, but it seems to run out quickly - you only get a few baths out of each bag. Refreshing and smells great, healing for the body
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy must
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and this stuff is a must for me. I put in it in my spa type tub and just relax in the warm swirling water. One of the best things I like about it is the aroma and no bath tub ring!
customer_reviews.author: WindyWu

customer_reviews.title: These smell nice but I was hoping for something with a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: These smell nice but I was hoping for something with a bit more of a scent that didn't disappear so quickly. I haven't noticed any beneficial effect as far as relief from aches and pains yet but that's not really the main reason I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: SnowGator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about these wonderful Epsom salts! This product soothes and invigorates.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Trent

customer_reviews.title: Nice treat for a good soak
customer_reviews.text: Especially liked the lavender for a good soak before bed - only issue for me was price for the size

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife as she has been having issues with her foot. This has helped relieve that pain some and it smells great. My have comes out of the bathtub relaxed.

customer_reviews.title: Good salt, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Good salt, but expensive. Costco is the place where I now buy it. They usually sell it plain but I add essential oil and its all gooood!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the smell can be overwhelming after use
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the smell can be overwhelming after use. I had to rinse several times after getting a bit of a headache. A little goes a long way but the results are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: laura Ball

customer_reviews.title: I actually LOVE the Peppermint but the lavender is kind of overwhelming ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually LOVE the Peppermint but the lavender is kind of overwhelming for me. regardless both work great and are wonderful additions to a bath!

customer_reviews.title: Presentation was not good
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived the bags were split at the sides and the Epson Salt had spilled in the box. I was able to recover about 50% of the salt to put in a baggie.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy January

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Being pregnant there is nothing like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Being pregnant there is nothing like a warm bath with relaxing salts. I put them in a decorative container near the bath and you can smell them every time you enter the bathroom.

customer_reviews.title: Aroma therapy!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy a soak with Dr Teal's and baking soda. Has pleasant scent. Have not shopped around for price but feel this from Amazon is good value and delivery to door is better for me with a bad back anyways.

customer_reviews.title: I only received 1/2 of this order! It was ...
customer_reviews.text: I only received 1/2 of this order! It was supposed to come with 2 bags and I only received al (the Lavender one). Where is the other bag??
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Gilbert

product_meta.title: Dr Teal's Epsom Salt Bath Soaking Solution, Eucalyptus and Lavender, 2 Count, 3lb Bags - 6lbs Total
product_meta.description: Scent:Eucalyptus and Lavender| Size:3 Pound (Pack of 2)Dr. Teals Epsom Salt Soaking Solution Bundle - 1 Relax & Relief Eucalyptus Spearmint 3lbs and 1 Sooth & Sleep Lavender 3lbs
feature_bullets: Made with Pure Epsom Salt (Magnesium Sulfate USP) and natural essential oils, Dr Teal’s Epsom Salt Soaks provide an array of benefits.

Ease Aches and Soreness: A Dr Teal’s Epsom Salt soak is an easy, achievable way to soothe sore muscles after workouts, help speed recovery, and get you back in the game of life. Pour 2 cups of Epsom Salt to a warm bath and soak for 20 minutes or, create a muscle-relaxing paste by dissolving a teaspoon of Dr Teal’s Pure Epsom Salt Soak into a cup of hot water and rub into sore muscles.
Resealable Bag: Our bags feature a VELCRO Brand enclosure to make resealing your epsom salts easier, quicker and sturdier than ever.
Quick & Easy Regimen: Soothe sore muscles with 2 cups of Dr Teal’s Epsom salt. Soak for 20 minutes 2 times per week.
